title: Chemex Classic
preparation_steps: Grind 30 grams of coffee to medium-coarse consistency
Place Chemex filter and rinse with hot water
Add 30g ground coffee and create a well in the center

brewing_steps.instruction: Bloom: Pour 60g water in circular motion, saturating all grounds
Wait for bloom to complete
Pour 150g water in spiral pattern from center outward
Wait for water to drain halfway
Pour remaining 290g water in steady spiral
Allow final drawdown to complete

notes: Produces clean, bright coffee with excellent clarity. Perfect for single serving.

title: Chemex Classic
preparation_steps: Grind 90 grams of coffee to medium consistency
Place Chemex filter and rinse with hot water
Add 90g ground coffee and create a well in the center

brewing_steps.instruction: Bloom: Pour 180g water in circular motion, saturating all grounds
Wait for bloom to complete
Pour 450g water in spiral pattern from center outward
Wait for water to drain halfway
Pour remaining 870g water in steady spiral
Allow final drawdown to complete

notes: Produces clean, bright coffee with excellent clarity. Perfect for 3 people.
